item.title: By: MartinG
item.dc:creator: MartinG
item.description: Where's LOTR? It's the book that _made_ us all geeks in the first place. It's the modern geek ur-scripture... well, that an C&VG Magazine...
item.content:encoded: Where’s LOTR? It’s the book that _made_ us all geeks in the first place. It’s the modern geek ur-scripture… well, that an C&VG Magazine…

item.title: By: Brad
item.dc:creator: Brad
item.description: Yes - and Terry Pratchett at number 9, hardly quality! At least Mr Banks had a showing with his first... although Excession was my fave.
item.content:encoded: Yes – and Terry Pratchett at number 9, hardly quality! At least Mr Banks had a showing with his first… although Excession was my fave.
